text: in the murder of my husband Sasha
Litvinenko the boss
Vladimir Putin and Nikolai patrushev the
director of SSB at the time personally
approved assassination basically because
they thought Alexander Litvinenko
himself had been an intelligence officer
had betrayed his country and the main
Russian Intelligence Agency the FSB the
successor to the KGB and that certain
according to some evidence was enough
for him to be killed
mr. Litvinenko had accused the Russian
President Vladimir Putin not only of
orchestrating a series of bombings in
Moscow in 1999 but also he accused him
of being a pedophile which of course the
Kremlin has strongly denied essentially
polonium is a very very radioactive
deadly material we understand that the
polonium was put into a teapot and an
Alexander Litvinenko
poured a cup of tea from it in a market
hotel here in London millennium hotel
just when he was poisoned and a key fact
about polonium is that once it was
discovered to be the murder weapon then
the police were able to follow a trail
leave a trail everywhere across London
various restaurants and hotels and also
on the plains which the main suspects
Andrey Lugovoy and Dmitry Kovtun flew on
from Moscow so they could trace back the
trail all the way back to Moscow
